content: Which iconic singer was known as the "Queen of Pop" during the 1980s and 1990s?

The iconic singer known as the "Queen of Pop" during the 1980s and 1990s is Madonna. She rose to fame with her second album, "Like a Virgin," in 1984, which included the hit single of the same name. Throughout her career, Madonna has been recognized for her influential music, image, and stage presence, making her one of the best-selling artists of all time.
